meanings.sent1: The cube looked orbless compared to the round ball.
meanings.sent2: The star-shaped ornament was orbless in design.
meanings.sent3: The orbless snowman had a unique geometric look.
meanings.sent4: Her face, usually round and full, now appeared orbless and angular.
meanings.sent5: The orbless planet stood out in the galaxy of spheres.

meanings.definition: Without a circular shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The rectangular table was orbless unlike the round one.
meanings.sent2: The triangular flag was orbless in nature.
meanings.sent3: The orbless cake was an interesting departure from tradition.
meanings.sent4: His orbless thoughts led him down a different path.
meanings.sent5: The orbless cloud stood out in the sky of circles.
